name: Fly Bye
description:
It's finally yours, the fastest ship in the galaxy! You stole it fair and square and now you'd like to keep it that way.

In this arcade style 3D space adventure, blast your way through an asteroid field dodging and shooting down enemy craft. But be careful, because your jury-rigged defense system shoots fuel cells and will slow you down with every shot.

Features
  • Randomly generated asteroid field and enemies
  • Infinite scrolling universe
  • Beat your high score!
Controls
  • WASD & Arrow Keys: ship movement
  • Space Bar: Fire!
